LanguageData.LTSCourierDeniedMessage: Your request for a courier has been denied due to previous incidents. Please address any outstanding issues before making another request.
LanguageData.LTSCourierArrivalMessage: A courier named {PAWN_nameDef} has arrived to deliver rent and possibly other items. Ensure {PAWN_pronoun} is kept safe during {PAWN_objective} task.
LanguageData.LTSCourierDeliveredMessage: {PAWN_nameDef} has completed {PAWN_possessive} delivery and will be departing shortly.
LanguageData.LTSCourierDeliveredRentMessage: {PAWN_nameDef} delivered a total of {0} silver from your tenants.
LanguageData.LTSCourierDeliveredRentGoldMessage: {PAWN_nameDef} delivered a total of {0} silver and {1} gold from your tenants.
LanguageData.LTSCourierDeliveredGiftMessage: {PAWN_nameDef} delivered a gift from a satisfied tenant. How thoughtful!
LanguageData.LTSCourierDeliveredTechMessage: The Courier Association is impressed with your management and has sent you a piece of their advanced technology as a token of appreciation.
LanguageData.LTSCourierTenancyNoticeMessage: {PAWN_nameDef} has noticed your note for tenancy and has posted a possible applicant for you to review.
LanguageData.LTSCourierTenancyNoticeFailFundsMessage: {PAWN_nameDef} noticed an issue with your advertisement due to insufficient funds and has left it as is. Please address this issue to proceed.
LanguageData.LTSLoneCourierDiedMessage: The courier {PAWN_nameDef} has died while in your area. You are being held responsible for this incident.
LanguageData.LTSAdvertisementFailed: {PAWN_nameDef} failed to place the advertisement due to insufficient silver.
LanguageData.LTSAdvertisementGizmoDesc: When toggled on, a pawn will ensure an advertisement is always posted, provided you have enough silver.
LanguageData.LTSAdvertisementSingleRoomGizmoDesc: A pawn will require a single room but will pay extra. Failing to provide this will cause tenant frustration.
LanguageData.LTSAdvertisementFightableGizmoDesc: Select whether applicants can engage in combat (✓) or not (X). This setting doesn't account for traits or other factors that disable violence.
LanguageData.LTSAdvertisementMayJoinGizmoDesc: Select whether applicants can request to join your faction (✓) or not (X).
LanguageData.LTSAdvertisementCostDesc: Displays the silver cost for placing an advertisement, which triggers the tenancy event upon courier retrieval.
LanguageData.LTSContractText: {PAWN_nameDef} wishes to extend {PAWN_possessive} stay. Will you accept the same contract of {0} silver per day for the next {1} days?
LanguageData.LTSContractJoinReject: {PAWN_nameDef} is saddened by your decision but respects your choice.
LanguageData.LTSContractJoinAccept: {PAWN_nameDef} is overjoyed and promises that {PAWN_pronoun} will make you proud of your decision.
LanguageData.LTSMoodBelowThresholdDesc: Your tenant {PAWN_nameDef} is unhappy. Take steps to improve {PAWN_possessive} mood, or {PAWN_pronoun} may leave.
LanguageData.LTSTenancyRoomRequiredDesc: Your tenant has paid for a single room but does not currently have one! Resolve this soon, or risk earning their ire.
LanguageData.LTSLoneTenantDied: The tenant {PAWN_nameDef} died while leaving the area. You are held responsible for this incident.
LanguageData.LTSTenancyAutoRenewDesc: This contract will automatically renew upon its conclusion unless canceled. Keep this in mind to avoid unexpected tenant extensions.
LanguageData.LTSContractAutoRenewText: {PAWN_nameDef}'s tenancy contract has been automatically renewed.
LanguageData.LTSCourierDaysSpawnDesc: Sets the minimum time between courier events. Note: A noticeboard is still required.
LanguageData.LTSTenancyRentContractDesc: Specifies the amount of silver paid per day under the tenancy contract.
LanguageData.LTSMoodTicksDesc: Determines the number of ticks required to trigger a mood-related event for tenants.
LanguageData.LTSKillPenaltyDesc: Enables or disables additional consequences for killing tenants or couriers.
LanguageData.LTSSameIdeoDesc: When enabled, the tenancy association will share the same primary ideology as the player. The faction's primary ideology updates whenever a new tenancy contract is created.
LanguageData.LTSGoldPaymentDesc: Allows couriers to deliver a mix of silver and gold if accumulated rent exceeds 500 silver. Up to 20% of the total can be converted to gold at a conversion rate of 1 gold = 10 silver.
LanguageData.LTSAdvertNoticeSoundDesc: Enables a beep and message notification whenever a pawn sets up a notice or any other tenancy-related event.
LanguageData.LTSAllowArchiteDesc: Enables or disables the option to accept tenants with archite genes. These advanced genes can significantly impact gameplay and balance.
LanguageData.LTSAllowNonFleshDesc: Enables or disables the option to accept tenants who are either artificial beings, such as androids, or do not require food or rest to survive, like mechanoids or other entities.
